item.title: Portfolio Website
item.description:
Portfolio Website

Overview

This is my personal portfolio site, showcasing my projects, certifications, and blog posts. Built using Hugo, a fast static site generator, and the Gokarna theme for a clean and elegant design.

Technologies Used

  • Hugo
  • Gokarna Theme
  • HTML/CSS
  • Netlify (Deployment)

Key Features

  • Custom content sections for Projects and Certificates
  • Responsive layout
  • Fast static delivery
  • Easy content management with Markdown

Demo

Live Demo
